definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，法學院過多了，並對法定職業誇下海口。

sentences.english: So when she goes to the law school she takes a serious risk.
sentences.chinese: 所以她來讀法學院是相當冒險的。

sentences.english: She graduated from Wellesley College and Yale Law School.
sentences.chinese: 她畢業於韋爾斯利學院和耶魯大學法學院。

sentences.english: Dr Matthew Stephenson, Assistant Professor, Harvard Law School.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬森馬修博士，助理教授，哈佛大學法學院。

sentences.english: I enrolled in Yale Law School in the fall after the riots .
sentences.chinese: 暴亂之後的秋季我進入了耶魯法學院學習。

sentences.english: Three will be graduates of Yale Law School.
sentences.chinese: 三名是耶魯大學法學院畢業生。

sentences.english: I will tell what I thought law was before I went to law school.
sentences.chinese: 我會告訴你們在我讀法學院之前我認爲法律是什麼。

sentences.english: Why did you choose to go to law school?
sentences.chinese: 你當初爲什麼會選擇法學院呢？

sentences.english: And even here at the law school, we wrote papers in pairs and as groups.
sentences.chinese: 就算在法學院，我們也是成對和分組寫論文的。

sentences.english: Is the tuition for law school expensive?
And I'm hoping to go to law school  and practice environmental laws, so.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能夠進到法學院，學習環境法。

sentences.english: and how much money they're going to pay to do something like go to law school.
sentences.chinese: 也沒想清楚選擇法學院到底要花多少錢。

sentences.english: The Law School admits one entering class each year for courses beginning in late August.
sentences.chinese: 法學院每年都招一個八月下旬入學班。

sentences.english: Programs with dual degrees have become more common in recent years at law schools.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，法學院的雙料學位課程已經比較普遍。

sentences.english: But it seems like it's definitely a different model than the law school.
sentences.chinese: 但貌似它的模式和我們法學院截然不同。

sentences.english: and the Law School, which is focused on training lawyers.
sentences.chinese: 還有法學院專注於培養律師。

definition: National Taiwan University/abbr. to 臺大|台大[Tai2 Da4]

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2

definition: Fu Jen Catholic University of Peking (from 1925), forerunner of Beijing Normal University 北京師範大學|北京师范大学/Fu Jen Catholic University in New Taipei City, Taiwan

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2
Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Da4 xue2

definition: Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan
China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing, with undergraduate campus at Changping 昌平[Chang1 ping2], and graduate campus in Haidian district 海澱區|海淀区[Hai3 dian4 qu1]
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 fa3 Da4 xue2
Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2
